mapper.insert: insert into pay_money_sheet (id, customer, operator, total_amount, state, create_time) values (#{id}, #{customer}, #{operator}, #{totalAmount}, #{state}, #{createTime})

insert into pay_money_transfer_list (id, pay_money_sheet_id, bank_account_id, amount, remark) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.payMoneySheetId}, #{item.bankAccountId}, #{item.amount}, #{item.remark})
mapper.select: select * from pay_money_sheet order by id desc limit 0, 1
